author: "Noam Ross"
date: "March 7, 2015"
output: html_document
---

The [ArchieML](http://archieml.org/) syntax can be used to insert data into
unstructured text.

For instance, I could make a list like this

[hello]

* Item 1
* Item 2

[]

Or just some key-value pairs

max_value: 10

min_value: 3

Using the `archie_render()` function in "rchie", I can include this data
in the text of an R Markdown document (like *this* document), and these
variables will be available to all the code chunks.

```{r}
print(hello)
as.numeric(max_value) - as.numeric(min_value)
```
